data.text: @toadmeister 🎶Who do you think you think you are kidding Mr Putin, if you think we're on the run. We are the brands who will stop your little game. We are the brands who will make you think again. 'Cause who do you think you are kidding Mr Putin, if you think the West is done.🎶

@toadmeister The EU council has amended resolution 2361. Have a look at it.  If there is a majority of member states signing the legislation,  compulsory vaccination will be introduced. Amongst other totalitarian rules.
@toadmeister If only Australia could be so lucky! The Powers That Be nag 25/7 about "health concerns" yet if we dropped this lot the obesity rate would drop overnight!
@toadmeister They didnâ€™t.  It is.  Should be a quick squiggle. If anyone actually reads this bullshit anymore.

@toadmeister What Ukraine and the sanctions have proved to me, is that Corporations now hold the power and not governments. Government sanctions have only affected the rich, the sanctions of corporations reach the people.
